languages.text: "Работники ближайших палуб были проверены на наличие генетической мерзости, но найденные мутации находятся в пределах нормы для рабочего сброда. Сейчас их сгоняют в штаб дознания для допроса".

"The workers from the nearby decks have all been checked for genetic aberration, but the mutations identified are all within the norm for labouring masses. They are being rounded up for interrogation as we speak."
languages.original_text: "Работники ближайших палуб были проверены на наличие генетической мерзости, но найденные мутации находятся в пределах нормы для рабочего сброда. Сейчас их сгоняют в штаб дознания для допроса".

traits.locale_text: "The workers from the nearest decks have all been checked for genetic anathema, but the mutations identified are within the norm for labouring masses. They are being rounded up for interrogation as we speak."

"The workers from the nearest decks have all been checked for genetic anathema, but the mutations identified are within the norm for labouring masses. They are being rounded up for interrogation as we speak."

"The workers from the nearby decks have all been checked for genetic aberration, but the mutations identified are all within the norm for labouring masses. They are being rounded up for interrogation as we speak."

languages.text: « Les ouvriers des ponts voisins ont été auscultés en quête de signes de l'aberration génétique, mais les mutations décelées chez eux sont toutes conformes aux normes observées parmi les masses laborieuses. À l'heure qu'il est, nos agents se chargent de les rassembler afin que nous puissions les interroger. »
languages.original_text: "The workers from the nearby decks have all been checked for genetic aberration, but the mutations identified are all within the norm for labouring masses. They are being rounded up for interrogation as we speak."

traits.locale_text: « Les ouvriers des ponts voisins ont été auscultés en quête de signes de l'aberration génétique, mais les mutations décelées chez eux sont toutes conformes aux normes observées parmi les masses laborieuses. À l'heure qu'il est, nos agents se chargent de les rassembler afin que nous puissions les interroger. »

languages.text: «Ya hemos examinado a todos los trabajadores de las cubiertas cercanas en busca de aberraciones genéticas, pero las mutaciones identificadas están dentro de la norma para las masas trabajadoras. En estos momentos, los están reuniendo para preparar los interrogatorios».
languages.original_text: "The workers from the nearby decks have all been checked for genetic aberration, but the mutations identified are all within the norm for labouring masses. They are being rounded up for interrogation as we speak."

traits.locale_text: «Ya hemos examinado a todos los trabajadores de las cubiertas cercanas en busca de aberraciones genéticas, pero las mutaciones identificadas están dentro de la norma para las masas trabajadoras. En estos momentos, los están reuniendo para preparar los interrogatorios».

languages.text: “附近甲板的工人都接受了基因污染检查，不过所有的突变指标都在工人阶层可接受的范围内。目前，我们的人正在围捕他们，进行审讯。”
languages.original_text: "The workers from the nearby decks have all been checked for genetic aberration, but the mutations identified are all within the norm for labouring masses. They are being rounded up for interrogation as we speak."

traits.locale_text: “附近甲板的工人都接受了基因污染检查，不过所有的突变指标都在工人阶层可接受的范围内。目前，我们的人正在围捕他们，进行审讯。”

languages.text: 「近隣のデッキで働く労働者たちは全員、遺伝子異常のチェックを受けたが、確認された変異はすべて労働者の標準的なものでした。彼らは尋問のため、今集められているところです」
languages.original_text: "The workers from the nearby decks have all been checked for genetic aberration, but the mutations identified are all within the norm for labouring masses. They are being rounded up for interrogation as we speak."

traits.locale_text: 「近隣のデッキで働く労働者たちは全員、遺伝子異常のチェックを受けたが、確認された変異はすべて労働者の標準的なものでした。彼らは尋問のため、今集められているところです」

languages.text: "Die Arbeiter von den umliegenden Decks wurden alle auf genetische Abscheulichkeiten untersucht, doch die identifizierten Mutationen liegen alle innerhalb der Normen für den arbeitenden Pöbel. Sie werden just in diesem Augenblick zum Verhör zusammengetrieben."
languages.original_text: "The workers from the nearby decks have all been checked for genetic aberration, but the mutations identified are all within the norm for labouring masses. They are being rounded up for interrogation as we speak."

traits.locale_text: "Die Arbeiter von den umliegenden Decks wurden alle auf genetische Abscheulichkeiten untersucht, doch die identifizierten Mutationen liegen alle innerhalb der Normen für den arbeitenden Pöbel. Sie werden just in diesem Augenblick zum Verhör zusammengetrieben."

languages.text: "Civardaki güvertelerde bulunan işçilerin tamamı, genetik sapkı ihtimaline karşı kontrolden geçti. Ancak tespit edilen tüm mutasyonlar, işçi sınıfı için standart ölçüde. Şu anda hepsini sorgu için topluyoruz."
languages.original_text: "The workers from the nearby decks have all been checked for genetic aberration, but the mutations identified are all within the norm for labouring masses. They are being rounded up for interrogation as we speak."
